name: Raymond Truong
coverLetter: Been trimming since 2012 for a friend who grows and then moved to east la to trim for a pre-ico cultivation center. I've also been growing personally for 3 years now and have had multiple harvests. I can go through about 2 pounds of trimming A or B grade of outdoor nugs in a day no problem. Willing to travel, depends on the accommodations.  Check me out on instagram "cannaray"
